name: Bulk MRO Industrial Supply
headline: Full Stack Fintech and Supply Chain Platform for Global Trade
description:
Bulk MRO is a Full Stack Fintech and Supply Chain Platform for Global Trade. 

We provide our customers and suppliers turnkey solutions for procurement, sales and financing of long-tail industrial products (MRO items) as well as high value bulk commodities like agriculture, petroleum, and chemical products. 

We work with hundreds of Large Corporations and Government customers across North America, Europe, India, Middle East, and Africa as a one-stop shop for millions of products from thousands of manufacturers.

We are backed by the world’s best investors like Y Combinator, Bain Capital Ventures, Ace & Co., Rebright Partners, Dream Incubator, Refactor Capital, AAF, and FJ Labs.

## WHAT WE BRING TO THE TABLE
## Our Value Proposition
India’s leading Supply Chain and Turnkey Management platform, focused on procurement, sourcing, working capital solutions, cross border trade and project management. From efficient manufacturing plants, resilient supply chains to smoother and efficient procurement, we enable enterprises to focus on what they do best.
###  Faster Sourcing for Procurement Managers 
One-stop-shop with a global network for 1.5 million products across 50+ categories 
###  Modern Technology-enabled Personalization 
Using technology to deliver tailored procurement solutions for your requirements 
###  Flexible Working Capital Solutions 
Faster TAT: On demand working capital for finance managers 
## IMPACTING LIVES ACROSS NATIONS
## Impact We Created
We are Bulk MRO. We are India’s leading Supply Chain Sourcing & MRO platform, focused on sourcing, custom manufacturing procurement and infrastructure industry supplies. From efficient manufacturing plants, resilient supply chains to smoother and efficient procurement, we enable enterprises to focus on what they do best. 
Founded in 2015, Bulk MRO expanded its offerings from just the Maintenance, Repair and Operations Category to more than 15 lakh products and services across 45+ categories today. Over the years, our team of experienced professionals has catered to a large number of customers by giving them access to 1,000s of suppliers globally.

## Three Reasons
## Why Choose Bulk MRO?
###  Global Operations, Network of Manufacturers & Logistics Companies 
Network that spans across 23 offices in 6 continents and 20,000 global suppliers enables you to consolidate your domestic and international procurement. We also provide multiple solutions for logistics (Air, Sea and Charter Flights) and deliver on EXW, FOB, CIF or DDP basis. 
###  Top Quality and Attractive Pricing with Global Certifications, Reduced Paperwork and Compliances 
Our direct global network of pre-vetted and authorized manufacturers, ensures smooth ordering and deliveries of genuine products at the most attractive prices, that are compliant with international quality standards such as US FDA, European CE, Chinese CFDA and Indian BIS. 
###  Choose From Our Flexible Working Capital Solutions 
We don’t want you to worry about how and when to pay us. We provide credit and extended payment terms to pre-empt and resolve working capital challenges. Choose from our flexible payment methods - you can pay by Wire Transfer, Letter of Credit or Escrow.

## Impact We Created
We are Bulk MRO. We are India’s leading Supply Chain Sourcing & MRO platform, focused on sourcing, custom manufacturing procurement and infrastructure industry supplies. ## Three Reasons
## Why Choose Bulk MRO?
###  Global Operations, Network of Manufacturers & Logistics Companies 
Network that spans across 23 offices in 6 continents and 20,000 global suppliers enables you to consolidate your domestic and international procurement. We also provide multiple solutions for logistics (Air, Sea and Charter Flights) and deliver on EXW, FOB, CIF or DDP basis. 
###  Top Quality and Attractive Pricing with Global Certifications, Reduced Paperwork and Compliances 
Our direct global network of pre-vetted and authorized manufacturers, ensures smooth ordering and deliveries of genuine products at the most attractive prices, that are compliant with international quality standards such as US FDA, European CE, Chinese CFDA and Indian BIS. 
###  Choose From Our Flexible Working Capital Solutions 
We don’t want you to worry about how and when to pay us. We provide credit and extended payment terms to pre-empt and resolve working capital challenges. Choose from our flexible payment methods - you can pay by Wire Transfer, Letter of Credit or Escrow.

generated_description:
**Bulk MRO Industrial Supply: A Quick Overview**

Founded in 2015, Bulk MRO Industrial Supply is a New York-based fintech and supply chain platform that has quickly carved out a niche in the realm of global trade. The mission? To be the one-stop solution for the procurement, sales, and financing of long-tail industrial products (think MRO items) and bulk commodities like agricultural goods, petroleum, and chemicals.

At its core, Bulk MRO provides a full-stack service: they take care of everything from sourcing products to financing and logistics, making it easier for large corporations and government clients to get what they need. Their clientele spreads across North America, Europe, India, the Middle East, and Africa, and their product offerings cover a staggering array of categories—over 1.5 million products sourced from thousands of manufacturers.

The company is backed by an impressive roster of investors, including heavyweights like Y Combinator and Bain Capital Ventures. With a passionate team of about 170 employees, Bulk MRO combines technology with industry expertise to enhance procurement efficiency.

### What They Offer

1. **Procurement**: Streamlined processes that link customers with reliable suppliers globally.
2. **Fulfillment**: Tech-driven solutions for order processing and inventory management.
3. **Financing**: Flexible credit options to enhance cash flow for buyers.
4. **Cross-Border Trade**: Solutions that facilitate international transactions and logistics.
5. **Turnkey Project Execution**: Comprehensive services that cover every phase of a project.

### Areas of Focus

Bulk MRO operates in diverse industries, covering everything from agriculture to pharmaceuticals, and they are dedicated to innovative solutions that simplify global trade—one procurement at a time.

### Recognition and Growth

Since its inception, Bulk MRO has rapidly expanded its operations, building a presence across 42 countries and executing trades on numerous international routes. Their commitment to excellence hasn’t gone unnoticed—numerous awards and accolades highlight their impact on the supply chain and procurement sectors.

In conclusion, Bulk MRO is not just a supply platform; it’s transforming how businesses approach procurement, making it smoother, faster, and more efficient in an increasingly globalized market. For enterprises looking to consolidate their supply chains and streamline processes, partnering with Bulk MRO could be a strategic move. Interested in learning more? Visit their website: [Bulk MRO](http://www.bulkmro.com).
